attributes.action: Stop Disney from shutting down the Club Penguin website on March the 29th
attributes.additional_details: I have been reading the comments on the post announcement and so many parents have been saying how their children are completely distraught. Club Penguin have build up a loyal fan base and also a wide selection of physical and virtual products. Children will lose these virtual products they have worked so hard for when the site shuts down.
attributes.background:
Disney have announced that they're shutting down the Club Penguin website on March the 29th. So many people have been enjoying the site since it launched 11 years ago. 
This has upset so many children and will cause heartbreak to so many.
